name: silent-risk
description: Confidential AI DApp using Zama fhEVM and Concrete-ML

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:ui" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.dev:worker: cd worker && python -m celery worker -A tasks.celery --loglevel=info
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:worker
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ui && npm run lint:contracts
scripts.format: npm run format:ui && npm run format:backend && npm run format:worker
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules ui/node_modules contracts/node_modules ui/.next contracts/artifacts contracts/cache
scripts.setup: npm install && cd ui && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install

author: Silent Risk Team
